TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HandledMouseEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs

summary.span: 允許自訂控制項防止 事件傳送至其父容器。

span.span: Allows a custom control to prevent the event from being sent to its parent container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您會想要使用主要是在開發需要處理滑鼠滾輪事件本身，並防止它們被看到控制項的直屬父容器的控制項。You will want to use primarily when developing a control that needs to handle mouse wheel events itself, and prevent them from being seen by the control's immediate parent container. 不會直接以傳遞當它處理事件。 is not passed directly by when it handles the event. 相反地，使用，您必須轉換為其為了取消次數。Rather, uses a , which you must cast to a in order to cancel an occurrence of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將標示為已處理的自訂控制項中的滑鼠滾輪事件。The following code example demonstrates how to mark the mouse wheel event as handled in a custom control. [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs/VB/MouseWheelControl.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.span: 其中一個 值，指出按下哪個滑鼠鍵。

span.span: One of the values indicating which mouse button was pressed.
The number of times a mouse button was pressed.

param.name: x
param.span: 按一下滑鼠時的 X 座標 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The x-coordinate of a mouse click, in pixels.

param.span: 按一下滑鼠時的 Y 座標 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The y-coordinate of a mouse click, in pixels.

param.name: delta
param.span: 滑鼠滾輪滾動時帶有正負號的刻度數。

span.span: A signed count of the number of detents the wheel has rotated.

summary.span: 使用指定的滑鼠按鈕、滑鼠按鈕按下次數、水平和垂直螢幕座標 (Screen Coordinate)，以及滑鼠指標位置的變更，初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified mouse button, number of mouse button clicks, horizontal and vertical screen coordinates, and the change of mouse pointer position.
